list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the tapered, sharp end of a tool, weapon, or other object.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: điểm của con dao găm của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a dot or other punctuation mark, in particular a period.
a particular spot, place, or position in an area or on a map, object, or surface.
a single item or detail in an extended discussion, list, or text.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you ignore a number of important points
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn bỏ qua một số điểm quan trọng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in sports and games) a mark or unit of scoring.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he scored 13 of his team's final 19 points against Houston
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ông đã ghi được 13 điểm cuối cùng của đội bóng của mình vào Houston

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of thirty-two directions marked at equal distances around a compass.
a narrow piece of land jutting out into a lake or ocean.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the boat came around the point

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a unit of measurement for type sizes and spacing, which in the US and UK is one twelfth of a pica, or 0.013835 inch (0.351 mm), and in Europe is 0.015 inch (0.376 mm).
each of a set of electrical contacts in the distributor of a motor vehicle.
a small leading party of an advanced guard of troops.
the extremities of an animal, typically a horse or cat, such as the face, paws, and tail of a Siamese cat.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a pure white dog with black points
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một con chó trắng tinh khiết với điểm đen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a spot to which a straight run is made.
a tagged piece of ribbon or cord used for lacing a garment or attaching breeches to a doublet.
a short piece of cord for tying up a reef in a sail.
the action or position of a dog in pointing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một con chó chim trên điểm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an important phrase or subject, especially in a contrapuntal composition.
direct someone's attention toward something by extending one's finger or something held in one's hand.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the boys were nudging each other and pointing at me
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các chàng trai đang huých lẫn nhau và chỉ vào tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give force or emphasis to (words or actions).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he wouldn't miss the opportunity to point a moral
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy sẽ không bỏ lỡ cơ hội để chỉ ra một đạo đức

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: extend (the toes or feet) in line with the leg by tensing the foot and ankle in such a way as to form a point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: reach up with your arms and point your toes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiếp cận với cánh tay của bạn và chỉ ngón chân của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fill in or repair the joints of (brickwork, a brick structure, or tiling) with smoothly finished mortar or cement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bricks have been poorly pointed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những viên gạch đã được chỉ định kém

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give a sharp, tapered point to.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he twisted and pointed his mustache
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh vặn và chĩa ria mép của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: insert points in (written Hebrew).
